scripts.build-ts: rm -rf dist && tsc && tsc -p client && cp pb/*.proto dist/pb && chmod a+x dist/main.js
scripts.build-napi: node-gyp rebuild && mv build/Release/mmap.node dist/mmap-wrapper.node && rm -r build
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-napi
scripts.test: npm run build && tsc -p test && nyc --reporter=lcov ava --verbose dist/test/main.js
